Passive.Name: JavaScript Engine
Passive.Desc: The power of God and JavaScript! At the start of the Scene, double the current light.

Passive.Name: Iceblood Tower
Passive.Desc: Once per scene, add the dice of a random combat page in hand to a combat page being used.

Passive.Name: Do not go home until you finish reading the value of e
Passive.Desc: Every die will roll a digit of e. After the first 100 digits, it resets to the first digit.

Passive.Name: Supplicants
Passive.Desc: At the start of each scene, recover 2 HP for each ally still alive

Passive.Name: Oppression
Passive.Desc: At the start of each scene, all other allies take 5% of max HP as damage. Every six scenes, kill all allies. For each one killed, add an INFERNO! page to hand.

Passive.Name: Eredar Lord's Arrogance
Passive.Desc: When HP reaches 300, continue to the next phase.

Passive.Name: Eredar Lord's Fury
Passive.Desc: At the start of the act, add five INFERNO! pages to hand, and replace all Summoning Portal pages in deck with Greater Summoning Portal. At the start of each scene, draw 3 cards and restore 3 light. Gain 2 speed dice.
